rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: This is a blue bathroom. Yellowing toiletries surround the room and a toothbrush sticks out of an open drawer.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: This is a large bedroom. An unmade bed and bedside occupies one corner and a closet and dirtly clothes occupy the other.

rooms.name: TopStair
rooms.description: This is the top of the stairs. Did you know that there are 12,000 accidental stairway deaths each year?

rooms.name: BottomStair
rooms.description: This is the bottom of the stairs, nothing to see here.

rooms.name: LivingRoom
rooms.description: This is a living room. A tv is mounted beside a book shelf and a couch lies in front of it.

rooms.name: HouseKitchen
rooms.description: This is a small kitchen. There are cuboards and a stove in front of you with a microwave, fridge and sink adjacent to it.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: This is a garage. Your car is parked by the door. Shelves messy with miscellaneous items line the three other sides.

rooms.name: OfficeKitchen
rooms.description: This is a kitchen. A fridge sits adjacent to a table and chairs. A microwave lies atop the counter and under the cuboards.

rooms.name: Reception
rooms.description: This is a reception. An empty desk contains a mess of stationaries that have been not been organized in a long time.

rooms.name: Top Office Stairs
rooms.description: This is the top of the stairs. Be careful not to fall down.

rooms.name: Bottom Office Stairs
rooms.description: This is the bottom of the stairs. Be careful not to fall up.

rooms.name: OfficeBasement
rooms.description: This is a basement. Boxes lie stacked in the corner, shadowed by the dark lighting.

rooms.name: Concierge
rooms.description: This is a hotel lobby. Several concierges sit behind a desk checking in various guests.

rooms.name: Mail Room
rooms.description: This is a mail room. Stacks of unorgaized packages are scattered around.

rooms.name: Hotel Rooms
rooms.description: This is a hallway. Doors to each room line the walls.

rooms.name: Room One
rooms.description: This is a hotel room. A couch sits before a tv on the wall. A table sits near the entrance and doors lie on each adjacent wall.

rooms.name: Hotel Bedroom
rooms.description: This is a bedroom. A bed and several furnishings fill the room and a large window replaces the outer wall.

rooms.name: Hotel Washroom
rooms.description: This is a washroom. A sink, shower, and mirror occupy the room. Various toiletries are on a rack below the sink.

rooms.name: Abandoned House Lobby
rooms.description: This is the entrance of a house. Various shoes are scattered around. A collapsed shoe rack lies over a small bench.

rooms.name: Foyer
rooms.description: This is a foyer. Several decorations have fallen from their place and hanged photos have been incased in dust.

rooms.name: Abandoned House Kitchen
rooms.description: This is a kitchen. The counter has been covered in dirt and unused plates. The other appliances are all in a similar state of disarray.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: This is a dining room. The table and chairs have clearly not used in a long time.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: This is a dining room. The wallpaper has degraded and decorations on the table have been cloaked in dust.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: This is a bathroom. The wood of the drawers has begun to decay, the mirror is so dusty that it's no longer usable.

rooms.name: Abandoned House Stairs
rooms.description: This is the bottom of the stairs. No where to go but up.

rooms.name: Stairs
rooms.description: This is the top of the stairs. Your feet have left obvious marks in the carpet of dust.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: This is a hallway. Vague photos of a family furnish the walls.

rooms.name: Abandoned House Bedroom
rooms.description: This is a bedroom. A large bed sits at the back of the room. Light from the window reveals several furnishings set around the room.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: This is a bathroom. The bathtub and sink have stained and several webs decorate the room.

rooms.name: Study
rooms.description: This is a study. Papers lie scattered on a desk. Small amounts of colour stickout from the many books on the shelves.

rooms.name: Storage Room
rooms.description: This is a ladder. It's old and weathered but sturdy enough to use.

rooms.name: Attic
rooms.description: This is an attic. There are a few boxes and other miscellaneous items. The amount of dirt and dust makes it hard to breathe.
